mapper.update:
update tb_share_commodity
commodity_id = #{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update tb_share_commodity set commodity_id = #{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip_address = #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, share_type = #{shareType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from tb_share_commodity where commodity_id = #{id} and member_phone LIKE '%${phone}%' ORDER BY create_date DESC
